title: If Indian fishermen did not poach on Sri Lanka’s territorial waters during LTTE terror rule, why now?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – There is something more than fishy about the sudden surge in Indian fishermen poaching on Sri Lankan territorial waters leading to a diplomatic debacle between India and Sri Lanka.
